pages.text: The $(mob)Mummy$() is a monster that spawns in Deserts in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It attacks players on sight with simple melee attacks which inflict $(thing)Hunger$() on its target. It is resistant to knockback, but as an undead it is vulnerable to sunlight. While on fire, a $(mob)Mummy's$() melee attacks may set targets on fire as well, similar to a $(l:minecraft_zombie)$(mob)Zombie$(). It will occasionally summon $(l:grimoireofgaia_mite)$(mob)Gravemites$() when struck.
$(mob)Mummies$() drop $(item)Iron Nuggets$() on death, which can be combined to make $(item)Iron Ingots$().

$(mob)Mummies$() drop $(item)Iron Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while in hand to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of iron. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Small)$().
